title: Connection
author: OneRepublic
lyrics:
[00:05.42] These days my waves get lost in the oceans
[00:08.64] Seven billion swimmers, man I'm goin' through the motions
[00:11.49] Sent up a flare, I need love and devotion
[00:14.36] Traded for some faces that I never know, notion
[00:17.43] Maybe I should try to find the old me
[00:19.63] Take me to the places and the people that know me
[00:22.28] Trying to just connect, thinking maybe you could show me
[00:25.25] If there's so many people here, then why am I so lonely?
[00:28.85] Can I get a connection?
[00:31.47] Can I get, can I get a connection? (lonely)
[00:34.62] Can I get a connection?
[00:36.91] Can I get, can I get a connection?
[00:39.81] Real friends, good friends hard to find, let's face it
[00:43.04] Buy the perfect home, and there's a flood in the basement
[00:46.06] Made a couple dollars now but I ain't trying chase it
[00:48.52] Kids from Oklahoma, man, we don't waste it
[00:51.72] I'm just trying to paint the picture for me
[00:53.63] Something I could give a damn about in maybe 40
[00:56.41] Years and I'll be ready and willing, and able to edit the story
[00:59.67] 'Cause there's too many people here to be so damn lonely
[01:03.12] Can I get a connection?
[01:05.43] Can I get, can I get a connection? (lonely)
[01:09.04] Can I get a connection?
[01:11.18] Can I get, can I get a connection? (lonely)
[01:14.85] I can see it in my, see it in my reflection
[01:19.39] Oh, can I get a connection?
[01:22.64] Can I get, can I get a connection?
[01:27.61] 
[01:31.09] (Lonely)
[01:34.02] 
[01:37.07] Right now, right now, I'm switching to a new lane
[01:40.28] Foot to the floor, man searching for the real thing
[01:43.18] Need somebody else, sometimes ain't no shame
[01:45.90] Head to the clouds sayin'...
[01:48.13] It's like, can I get a connection?
[01:51.27] Can I get, can I get a connection? (lonely)
[01:54.56] Can I get a connection?
[01:57.06] Can I get, can I get a connection? (lonely)
[02:00.51] I can see it in my, see it in my reflection
[02:05.14] Oh, can I get a connection?
[02:08.52] Can I get, can I get a connection?
[02:13.97] Ah, trying to find the old me (lonely)
[02:18.81] Yeah
[02:20.47]
